entry.title: The invalid person
entry.summary: Invalidating a person is an easy thing to do. It is extremely easy but can cause lasting damage. That damage can only be repaired through an act of vulnerability.

entry.title: A Business Guide to Technical Risk

link.title: A Business Guide to Technical Risk

entry.summary: When talking about technical risk, we are really talking about the risk of failure. There are a lot of ways to identify areas that have a high risk of failure and then use that to assess what if anything should be done about it. However, these are usually opaque to the businessman. This article hopes to make them more visible.

entry.title: The waste in the way we improve

link.title: The waste in the way we improve

entry.summary: The way we are taught to improve is rife with waste, and that waste builds up and prevents us from becoming truly spectacular. So, we need to do something extremely different.

entry.title: Radical Empathy
entry.summary: Empathy is a skill that is learned. It is learned with effort and plied to make our lives more meaningful. To get the most of this skill, we need to focus it where it hard to give empathy. Only by giving empathy to those we feel do not deserve it can we become proficient.

entry.title: Domain Driven Development - An Honest Review

link.title: Domain Driven Development - An Honest Review

entry.summary: Overall, a really good introduction to Domain Driven Development. However, the author spends too much time selling his other book on domain driven development. If the writer would have only mentioned his other book once this could have been a 4 star book. If the writer could have woven other references in besides his own, it would have been a 5 star book.
